Documentation

Learn how to build your website with boba!

Breakpoints

Reference of all of boba's breakpoints
Breakpoints
xs Mobile up to 575px
sm Tablet between 576px and 767px
md Laptop between 768px and 991px
lg Desktop between 992px and 1381px
xl Widescreen above 1381px

Helpers

Helpers are utility classes to easily define layouts
Hide / Show
.hide Hides a component
.hide-xs Hides a component when breakpoint is xs or less
.hide-sm Hides a component when breakpoint is sm or less
.hide-md Hides a component when breakpoint is md or less
.hide-lg Hides a component when breakpoint is lg or less
.hide-xl Hides a component when breakpoint is xl or less
Spacing
.no-margin Removes all margin
.no-padding Removes all padding
Stylistic
.no-border-radius Removes all border-radii
.no-shadow Removes all shadows
